comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly Charles Belmont Davis, 1866-1926, an author and critic.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The NYT comes up trumps again. See: DON'T LEAVE YOUR JOB TO WRITE; Unless You Have an Extraordinary Fertility of Ideas, Charles Belmont Davis Advises. July 4, 1915, Sunday, MAGAZINE, Page SM16 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C0CE1D6123FE233A... for a photo, maybe even the same photo.
